name: Guard Post
context: These military tablets were recovered from what appears to be a small guard outpost at the settlement's edge. The tablets were found in a wooden chest that had been buried hastily, likely during an evacuation. The script shows the disciplined hand of trained soldiers and contains what appear to be duty rosters and patrol reports.

texts.name: Watch Assignment
texts.notes: Found in duty roster area. Military precision in script - standard watch order format.

texts.name: Water Ration
texts.notes: Located in supply storage. Efficient script with quantity marks - resource management record.

texts.name: Equipment Check
texts.notes: Discovered in armory area. Systematic script with check marks - daily equipment inspection.

texts.name: Signal Fire Orders
texts.notes: Found near beacon tower. Urgent script suggesting emergency communication protocols.

texts.name: Patrol Report
texts.notes: Located in report filing area. Clear, formal script indicating official documentation.

texts.name: Night Relief
texts.notes: Found in guard quarters. Weary script suggesting end-of-watch communication between shifts.

texts.name: Supply Request
texts.notes: Discovered in command area. Formal military script?
